name: Arlington National Cemetery
description: Arlington National Cemetery is a United States military cemetery in Arlington County, Virginia, across the Potomac River from Washington, D.C., beneath whose 624 acres (253 ha) have been laid casualties, and deceased veterans, of the nations conflicts beginning with the American Civil War, as well as reinterred dead from earlier wars.
